snippet: Energy Forward, a label for appliances that meet Energy Star’s top standards, seeks to appeal to consumers’ inner tech fan.
abstract: Energy-efficient flat screen televisions, along with other appliances, are being marketed for their cutting-edge technology rather than their merit as green products; advertisers shifted their focus after appeals to environmentalism failed to take hold among consumers.
lead_paragraph: Energy Forward, a label for appliances that meet Energy Star’s top standards, seeks to appeal to consumers’ inner tech fan.

headline.seo: New Products Sell Energy Efficiency by Stressing Engineering
headline.main: Subtly Selling ‘Green’ to the Flat-Screen Crowd
headline.print_headline: Subtly Selling ‘Green’ to the Flat-Screen Crowd
